dna.goal: Build a full-screen AI workstation for non-technical users with natural language and speech as the primary interface, using a tiled UI (Golden Layout), Tauri framework, and hybrid AI (local Ollama + cloud BYOK for GLM 4.7)
dna.context: Bridge the gap between non-technical users and computer operations by providing an AI chat operator that can execute tasks, manage files, browse the web, and perform system operations with safe constraints
constraints: Golden Layout JavaScript for tiled UI
Ollama for local AI (small model optimized for tool calls)
BYOK for cloud AI tuned for GLM 4.7
Write access limited to user directories
System operations exposed via controlled APIs
Embedded web browser for in-app browsing
Archive.org Downloader integration (Python3 script for book downloads)
resolved_ambiguities: Local AI implementation: Ollama with small model optimized for tool calls
Permission/sandboxing: Write access limited to user directories; system operations via controlled APIs
UI implementation: Tauri + Golden Layout JavaScript + embedded web view for browsing
